  • Method Details

    • getValidTermNames

      Set<String> getValidTermNames(CvRule<?> cvRule)
      Gets valid ontology term names using the constraints from the rule bean.
      Parameters:
      cvRule - controlled vocabulary validation rule
      Returns:
      recommended terms

    • getValidTerms

      Set<OntologyTermI> getValidTerms(CvRule<?> cvRule)
      Gets valid ontology terms using the constraints from the rule bean.
      Parameters:
      cvRule - controlled vocabulary validation rule
      Returns:
      a set of ontology terms (beans)

    • getValidTermNames

      Set<String> getValidTermNames(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions)
      Gets the set of terms (including synonyms) that satisfy all the restrictions.
      Parameters:
      restrictions - - objects that specify required ontology terms
      Returns:
      set of names (strings)

    • getValidTermNamesLowerCase

      Set<String> getValidTermNamesLowerCase(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions)
      Similar to getValidTermNames method, but the term names in the result set are all in lower case.
      Parameters:
      restrictions - controlled vocabulary restrictions (on type, context, ontology terms)
      Returns:
      set of valid ontology terms (turned into lower case)
      See Also:
      • getValidTermNames(Collection)

    • getTermNames

      Set<String> getTermNames(CvRestriction restriction)
      Gets term names and synonyms using the restriction bean to filter the data. (restriction's 'NOT' property is ignored here)
      Parameters:
      restriction - a restriction (on type, context, ontology terms)
      Returns:
      recommended ontology terms (names)

    • getValidTerms

      Set<OntologyTermI> getValidTerms(Collection<CvRestriction> restrictions)
      Gets a restricted set of CVs (including for synonyms) that satisfy all the restrictions in the set.
      Parameters:
      restrictions - - set of beans that together define the required constraint
      Returns:
      set of ontology terms

    • getTerms

      Set<OntologyTermI> getTerms(CvRestriction restriction)
      Gets CVs (including for synonyms) using the criteria defined by the bean ('NOT' property, if set 'true', is ignored)
      Parameters:
      restriction - restriction (on type, context, ontology terms)
      Returns:
      ontology terms (objects)
